sentences.en: A badger locked out of his house and saw the mitten. He climbed right in.
sentences.cn: 一只獾在自己的窝里向外看,也发现了这只手套. 它也凑热闹似的从右侧爬了进来.

sentences.en: As he ran to catch his snow - white mitten, he saw Baba's face in the window.
sentences.cn: 他连忙跑过去抓住了他的雪白色的手套, 他还看见奶奶正站在窗台前.

sentences.en: He took her money in one hand and with the other hand he grasped her mitten and said "Take me to where you live.
sentences.cn: 他一只手拿过她的钱，用另一只手抓住她的露指手套，说：“带我到你住的地方。

sentences.en: One red mitten lying lost under a poplar tree.
sentences.cn: 一只红色小猫迷惘地躺在白杨树下.

sentences.en: The Canadian Oxford Dictionary also lists garbage mitt—a new one on me—that is supposedly a heavily padded deerskin mitten favoured by garbage men.
sentences.cn: 《加拿大牛津英语词典》还列出了“垃圾手套”——我也是第一次看到——它应该是一种塞了很多棉花的鹿皮手套，分量较重，受到收垃圾的人的喜爱。

sentences.en: There is a hole in the thumb of his mitten.
sentences.cn: 他的手套的拇指上有个洞.

sentences.en: Up through the snow appeared a badger . He eyed the mitten and began to climb in.
sentences.cn: 当雪地里出现獾时, 它看见这支手套并开始想往里面钻.

words.tran_cn: 手；棒球手套；连指手套；女用露指长手套

trans.tran_en: a type of glove that does not have separate parts for each finger
